titleStmt.title: His Majesties prayers which he used in time of his sufferings. Delivered to Doctor Juxon, Bishop of London, immediately before his death, with his severall speeches to his children, (viz.) the Duke of Glocester, and the Lady Elizabeth. And a letter from the Prince to the King his father.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notesStmt.note: By King Charles I and Prince Charles. Material first printed in William Dugard's edition of the Eikon basilike.
"This is presumably John Playford's edition of the four Prayers, Letter, and Relations for which he entered in the Stationers' Register on 2 April 1649" -- Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
